text: Faces is the second studio album by the France-based, Cameroonian singer- songwriter Irma. It was released on 2 June 2014 and has charted in France, Switzerland and Belgium. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" ! scope="col"| Charts (2014) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |} ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:Irma (singer) albums
title: Faces (Irma album)
